name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented QA Engineer with 8 years of experience in test automation and quality assurance methodologies, proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Golang**. Adept at API testing, functional testing, integration testing, and regression testing, with a robust understanding of defect tracking tools and cloud services like **Google Cloud**. Proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions within Agile and SCRUM frameworks, ensuring compliance with industry standards.
In my previous roles as a Full Stack Developer, I created high-performance applications while utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js**. My experience extends to cloud environments like **Azure** and **AWS**, where I successfully implemented CI/CD pipelines that increased deployment efficiency. With strong interpersonal and time management skills, I excel in collaborative environments, leveraging attention to detail to drive projects to successful completion and enhance user experience.
